text:
@TeamPelosi @realDonaldTrump GUILTY of 100,000+ #COVIDDeaths & counting due to  his mismanagement of #COVID19 crisis & his asking for the slowing down of #Covidtesting. 
Trump name (& the “brand” value) will always be  synonymous w/#deceitful #despicable #malicious & #worthless #VoteTrumpOut
